verses.roman:
"prati-varṣe āisa sabe āmāre dekhite
āsite yāite duḥkha pāo bahu-mate

synonyms: prati-varṣe—every year; āisa—come; sabe—all of you; āmāre dekhite—to see Me; āsite—to come; yāite—to return; duḥkha pāo—you get much trouble; bahu-mate—in various ways.
translation: "All of you come to see Me every year," the Lord said. "To come here and then return must certainly give you great trouble.
